posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

I got home from setting up at a show for the weekend, and I'm still in the selling mood.  They are all individually priced.  I priced them all to have a little room for negotiation.  Some have only a tiny bit of room, while others have a little more.  Feel free to shoot me an offer.  PM is fine, email also works.  [url]lukealyon@gmail.com[/url]   I'm not looking to give them away, as they can just go into my ebay store if they don't sell.  But I would definitely prefer to move them.

Shipping is $3

I've got a pretty busy morning, so it might take me awhile to get back to you.  I'll answer all emails and PMs in the order received, and obviously a commitment to buy takes precedence over any negotiation or pending offer.

Thanks for looking!

Edit:  Please let me know if you'd like to see a better scan of any of these.  They came out smaller than I had intended.

Still Available:
Bastian P350
Rockenfeld
Molesworth
Howard

I forgot to clean out my PM box last night.  If you sent an email, I got it.  If you sent a PM, can you please resend it.  Sorry about that.
Was it the wssca show in seattle. I was going to go but was busy :(.

Yeah, Matt that's the show.  You should definitely plan to come in May.  It's a good time with good people, and there's a lot of cool stuff to see.

I still have 12 cards left above.  I'm still willing to wheel and deal.  Might be into trades as well.
